docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Admonitions
docs.text:
Example of an admonition/callout with a title

Title of admonition

Hello this is a callout

Collapsible

Hello this is a callout

docs.title: Code examples
docs.text:
An example of SAIL code

test
a!textField()

Another example of SAIL code

test
a!textField(
    label: "My text"
    value: "me"
)

docs.title: Content Tabs
docs.text: This is an example of content tabs

docs.title: Generic Content
docs.text:
Plain TextUnordered ListOrdered ListAn example of SAIL codeAnother example of SAIL code

This is plain text

  • First item
  • Second item
  • Third item
  1. First item
  2. Second item
  3. Third item
test
a!textField()
test
a!textField(
    label: "Test"
    value: "me"
)

docs.title: Flowcharts
docs.text:
graph LR
    A[Start] --> B{Failure?};
    B -->|Yes| C[Investigate...];
    C --> D[Debug];
    D --> B;
    B --->|No| E[Success!];
